TopicTitle: Is this alternate solar system possible?

Articles.Content:
13 hours ago, Diche Bach said:

2. Venus: intelligent life, but "no animals." That just doesn't seem believable at all.

I thought I changed that ages ago... alright I'll change it today.
I've edited the front post again, trying to take in as much input from the last few months as possible.

Looking through this system idea, I like it a lot! So... Many... Habitable... Places! Also, another part of the monolith has been deciphered: "If any intelligent life develops in this system and reads this, please send 500 million Altarian dollars to the Horsehead Nebula to cover the costs of making this system habitable. Thank you in advance. Also, please appreciate the fjords of Norway. I worked hard on them. Sincerely, Slartibartfast, Starship Bistromath, representing Magrathea Planet Manufacturing Corp."
So, is this at this point a conception for a Kerbal solar system? Or has it already been implemented in game?

Going to update based on the fact that dione has underground oceans?

also I had a really cool idea for a planet: a rocky world that due to its extremely high angular velocity has very weak gravity on the equator, and as a result is a near vacuum, but at the poles the gravity is higher, and as a result is capable of holding on to a fairly dense atmosphere

On 2016-10-17 at 11:08 PM, insert_name said:

Going to update based on the fact that dione has underground oceans?

also I had a really cool idea for a planet: a rocky world that due to its extremely high angular velocity has very weak gravity on the equator, and as a result is a near vacuum, but at the poles the gravity is higher, and as a result is capable of holding on to a fairly dense atmosphere

This project is on Hiatus for now.

 

I'm basically holding up whatever is left of this, and I lack the time to actually update it much anymore. And I'm not willing to sacrifice the level of detail here.

 

So what is here is the end, really, for now.

 

There were plans for a NIbiru system, but that's on hold.

The simulations also need to be completed.

 

Not sure with Dione, I think I rejected the idea for some reason. Not that it would be habitable anyways.
Have you ever considered making a planet pack that uses this system? I would totally download it.

1 minute ago, Benji13 said:

Have you ever considered making a planet pack that uses this system? I would totally download it. 

Sure. Until Nibiru is finished, not happening though.
